title: StarWars: Emporer karthus skin
body:
While drooling over the new Starwars movie a thought came to mind, master yis chosen skin being a knock off of a Jedi is the only starwarsy skin available so I started coming up with some ideas of other champs who could have a Starwars themed skin. 
On such idea was an Emporer karthus skin where he looks like The Emporer. His ult would be lighting. And his q might be butts of lightning shocks and his other abilitys based around the emporers powers. Any thoughts would be appreciated. Was also thinking of a kassidin darth Vader skin called fatherdin or something

replies.body: The issue skins that are based on other franchises is copyright. Sorry to burst your bubble, but these types of skins are most likely never going to happen
I do understand that but they got away with chosen master Yi and if they follow the same guidelines it could maybe happen
